original_text: Jesus himself had said earlier, ‘When a prophet of God visits his own town, the people there will not accept him.’
korean_text: 친히 증언하시기를 선지자가 고향에서는 높임을 받지 못한다 하시고

sentences.original_text: When a prophet of God visits his own town
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 선지자가 자신의 고향을 방문할 때

sentences.original_text: the people there will not accept him
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳 사람들은 그를 받아들이지 않을 것입니다
